Alias.name: Village Influencing Help
Alias.script:
cecho("
<purple>VILLAGE ON/OFF Toggle the package on and off.") cecho("
<purple>VCLAN <clan alias> Set the clan to make calls on.") cecho("
<purple>VSHUFFLE ON/OFF Toggle calling out shuffles to the set clan.") cecho("
<purple>VLIST See the list of villages and correlating race.") cecho("
<purple>VSET <village> Set your village for influencing.") cecho("
<purple>VCAMPAIGN 1 or 2 Sets campaign to CRUSADE for 1 or SANCTUARY for 2 to use as below.") cecho("
<purple>CTRL+F9 CR2 Influence skill, determined by your city.") cecho("
<purple>CTRL+F10 CR4 Influence skill, determined by your city.") cecho("
<purple>CTRL+F11 CR6 Influence skill, determined by your city.") cecho("
<purple>CTRL+F12 Campain <style> as set in VCAMPAIGN.") villageCampaignStyle = {}

Alias.name: Village Influencing Toggle
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then enableTrigger("Village Influencing") enableKey("Village Influence") cecho("<green> Village Influencing activated!") elseif matches[2] == "off" then disableTrigger("Village Influencing") disableKey("Village Influence") cecho("<red> Village Influencing deactivated!") end

Alias.name: Village Influencing Shuffling Toggle
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then enableTrigger("Shuffles") cecho("<purple> Shuffles will be announce on "..VillageClan.."!") elseif matches[2] == "off" then disableTrigger("Shuffles") cecho("<purple> Shuffles will <red>NOT <purple>be announce on "..VillageClan.."!") end

Alias.name: Village Influencing Clan
Alias.script: VillageClan = matches[2] cecho("\n<purple> Clan for Village calls set to <red>"..matches[2].."<purple>!")
